name: Topo
headline: AI sales agent custom trained for each company to reach the best leads
description:
We are helping B2B companies reach the right leads with an AI sales agent custom trained on their knowledge.

The goal is to reproduce the behavior of a sales top performers:

- They know the product, the industry, the pain points, and the company's value proposition perfectly (trained on datas from your knowledge base, calls transcript, CRM...). 

- They will find the right leads, ready to buy, based on buying signals in the industry-specific channels (Linkedin, G2, Github...) or on the company's website visitors.

That's exactly what the agent can do!

Think of it as an expert SDR in your industry, ramp up in minutes.

founders.name: Dan Elkaim, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder & CEO of Topo.io. 
I've been selling B2B SaaS for around 10 years. 
Previously, I led Aircall's strategic sales from 10 to $120M ARR.

founders.name: Léonard Henriquez, Founder
founders.description: From a business school grad to a tech guy with a Master's in AI, I've taken an unconventional path. I've grown from a Product Manager to an Engineering Manager, and now I'm the CTO at Topo.io. When not busy building SaaS, you'll find me either clinging to a cliff or building satellites – because why just conquer markets when you can explore space?

founders.name: Robin Philibert, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder at Topo.io, passionate about sales and entrepreneurship.

generated_description:
**Topo: Your Smart AI Sales Partner**

Founded in 2023 and based in Paris, France, Topo emerged from Y Combinator’s Batch W24. At its core, Topo is an innovative solution aiming to transform how B2B companies approach sales. The mission? To create AI sales agents customized for each business, enabling them to target and engage potential leads more effectively.

### Bridging Knowledge and AI
Imagine having the acumen of your top sales performers encapsulated in a digital agent. Topo's AI is trained on your unique knowledge base—product specifics, industry nuances, and pain points— gleaned from past interactions like call transcripts and CRM data. This comprehensive training equips the AI to identify leads that are genuinely prepared to buy, using buying signals tailored to specific industry channels like LinkedIn, G2, and GitHub, or even through the behavior of website visitors.

### The Power of Intelligent Outreach
Think of Topo as an exceptional Sales Development Representative (SDR) in your digital arsenal. The AI can ramp up in mere minutes, engaging with precision in hyper-targeted outreach campaigns. Users can define their Ideal Customer Profile (ICP), evaluate leads with meticulous criteria, and initiate impactful contact—all with minimal effort.

### Functionality at Your Fingertips
With just a straightforward command, your AI SDR can carry out a plethora of tasks:
- **Train the Agent:** Input relevant information for Q&A and CRM integration.
- **Launch Campaigns:** Effortless campaign setup that aligns with your sales strategy.
- **Find Top Leads:** Pinpointing prospects within your ICP becomes seamless.
- **Reach Out:** The agent communicates with leads through tailored messages across multiple platforms.

### Results-Oriented and Fully Integrated
The collaborative nature of Topo allows human teams to drive the strategy while leaving the execution to AI, resulting in higher efficiency and effectiveness. Plus, integration with existing CRM platforms means top-notch lead quality management without the hassles of juggling multiple tools.

### User-Centric with a Personal Touch
Backed by top-tier partners, including Nicolas Dessaigne as a group partner, Topo prides itself on user satisfaction, boasting a remarkable 4.9-star rating on G2. With a focused team of just five, they aim for impactful and sustained direct outreach results.

### Join the Sales Revolution
With Topo, forward-thinking companies redefine their sales approach, freeing their teams to build relationships and close deals without the legwork. Whether you’re in finance, marketing, e-commerce, or tech, Topo’s custom-trained agents are primed to meet your industry's demands. 

Ready to see it in action? **[Book a demo](https://www.topo.io/)** today and experience firsthand how Topo can streamline your prospecting process and revolutionize your sales outreach.
